DOC.brief_summary: Longitudinal study nonrandomized, multicenter observational descriptive monitoring patients treated with anti-angiogenic for metastatic kidney cancer
DOC.brief_title: Impact on Quality of Life, Fatigue and Cognitive Function in Anti-angiogenesis in Patients With Metastatic Kidney Cancer
